passages.text:
Please, be careful…
[[Oh you appear again...]]
passages.name: Second Level

passages.text:
Yeah… I have to tell you that there is a great danger here, bigger than everything you saw...
[[Don’t worry...->a1]]
[[I don’t know if I can...->a1]]

links.name: I don’t know if I can...

passages.name: Oh you appear again...

passages.text:
But here is a tip,  they will try to mess with your brain.
Beware of illusions.
[[Thanks for the advice, Neeko.->a2]]
[[~Scary~->a2]]
passages.name: a1

passages.text:
B 64 TmVla28gaXMgYW4gaWx1c2lvbg==
[[It's different, what it means?->END]]
